about_the_game:
Fly, teleport, and wall-jump your way through increasingly difficult levels. With the Broom, the Hat, and the enchanted Shoes, you’ll unlock powers that make every move feel exhilarating. Master the art of flying and discover new ways to outsmart every obstacle. But watch out, because it looks like that broom might not work as intended.

Join Maya as she embarks on a journey of self-discovery after an unexpected encounter with the young witch, Robbyn. Together, they hunt down an enchanted runaway printer, face magical challenges and uncover secrets along the way. Will Maya learn to accept who she truly is?

Every level is packed with secrets and hidden spellbook pages designed to test your skills. You will fail, but with every retry, you’ll get closer to mastering Maya’s powers and claiming every collectable. You enjoy speedruns? Race against the clock! Join our community on Discord to share your best time!

From the grimy depths of the Sewers to the vibrant City streets and the dangers hiding in the Clouds, each level offers a unique atmosphere and thrilling challenges. Every step forward reveals something new to explore! Can you make it to the witch city floating high up in the sky?
